code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import"./cours.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Course=_ref=>{let{course}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"couRs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:course.titre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:course.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"prix",children:[course.prix,"DA "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"date",children:course.date})]});};const Cours=()=>{const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost/winner1/fetch_ateliers.php').then(response=>{if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}return response.json();}).then(data=>{setCourses(data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching courses:',error);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"courses-container",children:courses.length>0?courses.map((course,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Course,{course:course},index)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"nop",children:"Aucun cours disponible"})});};export default Cours;
